0.Name: Abdominal and Direct Fetal ECG Database
0.Description: Multichannel fetal electrocardiogram recordings obtained from 5 different women in labor, between 38 and 41 weeks of gestation.

1.Name: AF Termination Challenge Database
1.Description: ECG recordings created for the Computers in Cardiology Challenge 2004, which focused on predicting spontaneous termination of atrial fibrillation.

2.Name: AHA Database Sample Excluded Record
2.Description: Two ECG signals that were excluded from the 1980 American Heart Association database.

3.Name: ANSI/AAMI EC13 Test Waveforms
3.Description:
The files in this set can be used for testing a variety of devices that
monitor the electrocardiogram. The recordings include both synthetic and real
waveforms.

4.Name: Apnea-ECG Database
4.Description: Seventy ECG signals with expert-labelled apnea annotations and machine-generated QRS annotations.

5.Name: A Pressure Map Dataset for In-bed Posture Classification
5.Description: Pressure sensor data captured from 13 participants in various sleeping postures.

6.Name: Autonomic Aging: A dataset to quantify changes of cardiovascular autonomic function during healthy aging
6.Description: This database contains resting recordings of ECG and continuous noninvasive blood pressure of 1,104 healthy volunteers

7.Name: Behavioral and autonomic dynamics during propofol-induced unconsciousness
7.Description: Multimodal point process indices for heart rate variability and electrodermal activity for 9 subjects who are undergoing a controlled propofol sedation experiment where the concentration was increased and then decreased in stages.

8.Name: BIDMC Congestive Heart Failure Database
8.Description: Long-term ECG recordings from 15 subjects with severe congestive heart failure.

9.Name: BIDMC PPG and Respiration Dataset
9.Description: ECG signals extracted from the MIMIC-II Matched Waveform Database, with manual breath annotations added by annotators using impedance respiratory signal.
